___wildCards.description: List of wildcards that can be used to be dinamically replaced on this setup, with different values for the build and release commands

___name.description: The name for the wildcard. This string will be searched on all the setup file and replaced with the build or release value

___build.description: The value that will be assigned to all the wildcard occurences when the build process is executed

___release.description: The value that will be assigned to all the wildcard occurences when the release process is executed

___$schema.description: Url to the json schema definition to validate this file

___tmpFiles.description: Defines the setup for the storage of temporary files into this depot instance

___source.description: The name for a source that will be used to store and read the temporary files

___logs.description: Defines the setup for the storage of logs into this depot instance

___source.description: The name for a source that will be used to store and read the logs

___storageFolderPath.description: The full file system path to the root of the storage folder (if used)

___googleDrive.description: Defines the setup for the google drive client

___cacheZone.description: The name for the cache zone where the google drive cached files will be stored. See GoogleDriveManager class for more info

___accountCredentialsPath.description: A full file system path to the file that contains the service account credentials that will be used to authenticate with the google drive API

___apiClientRoot.description: A full file system path to the root of the google-api-php-client library. See GoogleDriveManager class for more info

___filesTimeToLive.description: Defines the number of seconds after which the operations related to getting files content cache data will be deleted. Set it to 0 to for an infinite time. (1 hour = 3600 seconds, 1 day = 86400 seconds, 1 month = 2592000, 1 year = 31536000)

___cacheRootPath.description: A full file system path to the root of the folder where the cached google drive files will be stored. Set it to empty string to disable local cache. See GoogleDriveManager class for more info

___listsTimeToLive.description: Defines the number of seconds after which the operations related to listing files and folder cache data will be deleted. Set it to 0 to for an infinite time. (1 hour = 3600 seconds, 1 day = 86400 seconds, 1 month = 2592000, 1 year = 31536000)

___localizedFiles.description: Defines the setup for the storage of localized files into this depot instance

___failIfKeyNotFound.description: True to throw an exception if any localization key is not found (see TurboCommons LocalizedFilesManager constructor docs for more info)

___locales.description: The list of locales that will be used to perform translations on the item names. Sorted by preference, like: 'en_US', 'es_ES' (see TurboCommons LocalizedFilesManager constructor docs for more info)

___source.description: The name for a source that will be used to store and read the localized files

___locations.description: A list (sorted by preference) where each item defines a translations location (see TurboCommons LocalizedFilesManager constructor docs for more info)

___sources.description: Defines the destinations where the data will be saved and read

___name.description: A name we want to use as an alias for this file system source

___path.description: An absolute path that points to the root of this file system source. This is where the data will be stored when we use this source alias on our depots
